reuters.title: ATARI <ATC> CANCELS DOMESTIC DEBT OFFERING
reuters.body: Atari corp said it has canceled a planned 75 mln dlr domestic offering of convertible subordinated debentures in favor of an overseas offering. Yesterday, in London, lead underwriter PaineWebber Group Inc <PWJ> announced a planned offering of 75 mln dlrs of Atari convertible debentures due 2002 with an indicated coupon of five to 5-1/4 pct. Atari said the debentures will not be available for U.S. resal until at least 90 days after completion of the offering abroad. Reuter 
